data: Verify that an 'Admit to' Order has been entered prior to completing the powerplan (NOT required for direct admit patients)
Refer to Multi-System Inflammatory Syndrome in Children Provisional Evaluation Algorithm

Age: 9-12 months, Texture: Minced | Finger Food [9 - 13 month]

Provider must order starting diet.  RN or RD to place subsequent diet orders

Consider repeat SARS-CoV2 serology if patient admitted for more than 5 days, and initial serology negative
If anticoagulating then order anti Xa/LMWH Level 4 hours post second dose of enoxaparin. (goal 0.2 unts/mL to  less than 0.5 units/mL)
If/when once on low molecular weight heparin, then Anti Xa LMWH Unfractionated Level should be drawn 4 hours after the second dose, or the second new dose, if changed
